name: ECON - Elemental Connection
description: Minimalist abstract puzzle board game about making elemental connections. Match tiles to create a satisfying mosaic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7 (32 bit or 64 bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 25 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
